Package ca.cgjennings.ui

Class ToggleSelectionModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.DefaultListSelectionModel
ca.cgjennings.ui.ToggleSelectionModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, ListSelectionModel
public class ToggleSelectionModel extends DefaultListSelectionModel
A list selection model that toggles selection states instead of setting or clearing them.
See Also:
